description:
Commit Porto is a tech conference that brings together professionals who tackle challenges in software development with the latest technologies. It is an excellent opportunity for knowledge sharing and inherently promoting Porto as a vibrant and dynamic city for technology-based companies! Its 4th edition happens on June 30th! Grab your seat now!
*Registration to Commit Porto ’18 includes a €10 deposit. This deposit will be refunded to you in full once you check in on the day of the conference. The goal of the deposit is to help us get more accurate participant numbers so that we can have enough food, drink and t-shirts for everyone without waste! This will help Commit Porto be more sustainable!
Details: commitporto.com
location: Faculdade de Engenharia da Universidade do Porto
name: Commit Porto '18
